text: Avia Świdnik is a Polish football club based in Świdnik , Poland. In the 2015–16 season, they are playing in the Polish III liga Lubelsko-Podkarpacka group. They have played a total of 21 seasons in II Liga. During the 1985–86 season, they reached the quarter-final of the Polish Cup. ==2020–21 Avia Świdnik season== == External links == * Official website (Polish) * Avia Świdnik at the 90minut.pl website (Polish) Category:Football clubs in Poland Category:Association football clubs established in 1952 Category:1952 establishments in Poland Category:Świdnik County Category:Football clubs in Lublin Voivodeship
title: Avia Świdnik
